title: I feel suicidal and I swear nothing helps. I wrote a suicide note. How can I do it? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m not gonna discuss how you can do it. I do not believe a person can give informed consent to end their own life, until such time as it can be proven their life would otherwise never end, causing unbearable suffering for all eternity. Please share your note with me, and let me try and offer you a constructive criticism of your writing and the note itself. If you swear I won’t help, then I cannot.

No !!!! Dont!!! Dont !!! You have a lot to live for . I dont know you personally but I do know that there is always a way of things getting better as long as we have patience, patience with ourselves! Its important to start telling yourself how much you love yourself, and be your own best friend! Dont ever give up on yourself because you hhae a purpose in this world. God is always with you. Reach out to him, pray, read the bible, go to support groups there is a lot of help out there! Have a blessed day! I would definitely would live to see more questions on your part! So I repeat dont !!!
